website_summaries.verdict: Tide's eco-friendly option is a good choice for a more septic-friendly detergent.
pros: Tide Purclean comes with a nice honey lavender smell
For cleaning heavily soiled clothes, this extra-sudsy formula seems to do the trick
cons: Some may not appreciate the strong perfume scent

customer_reviews.title: Causes burning raised rash!
customer_reviews.text: I recently bought this Tide Purclean plant based detergent thinking it would be a good family-friendly alternative to buying two different kinds for us and the baby, and it caused me to break out in a burning, itchy rash with raised welts all over my body, from my head to the bottoms of my feet. My eyes and ears even swelled shut. I’ve never had such a severe allergic reaction to anything in my life. Do not buy this product if you have sensitive skin!
customer_reviews.author: smsailorneptune

customer_reviews.title: AWESOME PRODUCT!!
customer_reviews.text: AWESOME! I was in shock! I thought Purclean would be a step down in cleaning from regular Tide. Purclean is very good for septic systems, so, I reluctantly bought a bottle because we have a septic tank. Wow, Purclean is excellent! I think it cleans BETTER than REGULAR TIDE. Septic safe AND Tide cleaning power! I will use Purclean forever. Awesome product! Sorry about all of the exclamation marks, but, it was a very good surprise. I am happy.
customer_reviews.author: William Bones

customer_reviews.title: Best plant-based detergent in the market
customer_reviews.text: I love this detergent, it cleans very well (family with 2 small children, lots of messes), and leaves a subtle delicious scent on the clothes. I'm sensitive to fragrances (prone to migraine), but love scents, so thats perfect for me. Just FYI, plant-based detergents work best if you wash your clothes on hot water, so there's that to take into consideration.
customer_reviews.author: Dr_Mom

customer_reviews.title: We are kinda at war with the laundry just ever trying to find the perfect product that cleans our clothes leaving them smelling fresh ...
customer_reviews.text: My husband likes this stuff so far. We are kinda at war with the laundry just ever trying to find the perfect product that cleans our clothes leaving them smelling fresh and clean and not being full of toxins... this is what my husband prefers to my no toxin type stuff. ;)
customer_reviews.author: Emily

customer_reviews.title: Best Plant Based I’ve Tried
customer_reviews.text: I love Tide, it just works. I was hesitant to try the plant based version (even though I prefer les chemicals) because others I tried just didn’t work. I was pleasantly surprised and this will be my new go to detergent. Smells nice and gets the stains out with less harmful chemicals. Not 100% plant based but still better than the traditional and works just as well in my opinion
customer_reviews.author: Green_Eyed_Bandit

customer_reviews.title: Strong scent
customer_reviews.text: Great price and quantity. We have this set up on “subscribe and save” it’s been working out so far. If you are expecting a light sent though do not be fooled. Even with HE washing and an extra rinse the scent is still quite overpowering. But clothes come clean so it’s a tough call. We tried the scentless and original. We do like this the best so far but wished it was a little less perfumy :/
customer_reviews.author: go-lighter

customer_reviews.title: So Fresh & So Clean
customer_reviews.text: Great smell. Great price. Effectively cleans my clothes. Checks all the boxes and meets my obviously high standard of laundry detergent. You’ll love it.
customer_reviews.author: braxton aldrich

customer_reviews.title: Good for eczema/sensitive skin
customer_reviews.text: My young daughter has eczema and all normal scented detergents exacerbate it but I got tired of our clothes smelling like nothing after washing them so began searching for a scented detergent for sensitive skin. So far this one has not irritated her skin, cleans well and smells great. Also wash newborns clothes with this and have had no problems with his skin reacting to it.
customer_reviews.author: Mars

customer_reviews.title: CHANGED SCENT AS OF FEBRUARY 2020
customer_reviews.text: I've been using Tide Purclean for years, and have always loved the subtle scent. But Tide must have made changes recently, b/c i just (Feb 2020) opened and used a new bottle and the scent is different! It's MUCH more "artificial" smelling, almost like a candy smell. Definitely not lavender smelling anymore. And it's strong. I have just-cleaned clothes hanging up on a drying rack and the detergent smell is wafting through the room. Wish the manufacturer had noted the new scent on the bottle. I'll be switching to another version of Tide, maybe just their free and clear so i can avoid the same problem happening again.
customer_reviews.author: Hudson

customer_reviews.title: Received Counterfeit Detergent
customer_reviews.text: The "Honey Lavender Scent" labeled product I received from Amazon was clearly counterfeit. It didn't feature any scent, so I bought an authentic sample locally to compare against. The authentic sample smelled great, had different coloration, and had a different viscosity from the counterfeit detergent sold through Amazon, though both containers appeared authentic. I strongly suspect that the original authentic detergent was poured out and replaced with counterfeit product at some point before reaching Amazon. This would corroborate the skin rash that other customers reported for this product - I am discarding all of the detergent that I purchased through Amazon. Hopefully Amazon takes action to address this.
customer_reviews.author: Reggie

customer_reviews.title: Meh.
customer_reviews.text: Not terrible, like the smell, but my clothes never seemed quite as clean and bright as they did with Tide with Bleach Alternative, and it certainly didn't do as well on stains. The pleasant smell doesn't seem to linger very long either. Probably nice for things that are worn lightly/not stained/don't need deodorizing or sanitizing.
customer_reviews.author: maryamelia

customer_reviews.title: Great product for winter eczema
customer_reviews.text: Okay first off this detergent is amazing. Secondly, the seller put special wrap on the tops so they wouldn’t leak in transit!! What a relief!! I have the most sensitive skin in the winter, and this detergent got rid of all the itchiness.
customer_reviews.author: Kelley C.

customer_reviews.title: Meh
customer_reviews.text: I've used this numerous times and while I'm relatively happy with the product, cleans well, scent isn't overpowering, and plant based, I will no longer buy it. I have a HE front load and despite putting in less than the recommended amount for small/medium loads I get the Suds error because it produces too many suds. HE soap shouldn't have too much suds. We have soft water which my be the main culprit but since I can't change my water I will be changing my detergent.
customer_reviews.author: L. Kramer

customer_reviews.title: Feeling ripped off
customer_reviews.text: I have a serious problem with the amount of product missing out of these bottles last time I will use this vendor as you can see they still have the shipping tape on both of the containers feeling ripped off, not to mention the color of the product is different in both bottles
customer_reviews.author: shannon forrest

customer_reviews.title: Finally!
customer_reviews.text: I hesitated to buy this because I'm a bit of puritan when it comes to my "natural brands" - but after trying Seventh Generation, Mrs. Meyers, ECOS etc. etc. and being frustrated with their inability to fully wash my clothes ESPECIALLY items related to "that time of the month," not smelling that good and being rough when dried I got fed up. This detergent FULLY cleans my clothes, has a nice but not overpowering scent, and the fabric is noticeably much softer to the touch but without the residue fabric softeners often leave. It's a corporate brand but I'm buying as long as the other companies don't catch up.
customer_reviews.author: Rachel Floyd

customer_reviews.title: Cleans everything, smells good, naturalish - what else is there?
customer_reviews.text: I really like this soap. Neither of us has sensitive skin or anything, but I appreciate cutting out chemicals and choosing natural options when possible. We wash everything from delicates to bed linens to dog collars in this and it all comes out clean and smelling good. Just know the container is pretty small - it's more single/couple sized than large family size. Perfect for apartments and the set of two lasts us for a few months. I also appreciate the grippy tape Amazon ships these in so the lids don't leak. I'm sure I could buy them somewhere cheaper but it's convenient to have them shipped right to the door.
customer_reviews.author: Trailblazer7232

customer_reviews.title: Not clean rinsing
customer_reviews.text: This is NOT a clean rinsing detergent. I tried this as a change from my normal clean rinsing agent (rockin’ Green), but all my clothes come out heavily scented and static-filled. The biggest problem is this detergent has caused build-up in my washer and it smells like honey-lavender funk all the time. I’ve never had build up in 7 years of using a variety of truly clean-rinsing detergents. Gross. I’m not even going to finish the bottle.
customer_reviews.author: J. Eagle

customer_reviews.title: different product
customer_reviews.text: This is the second time I've ordered this product. The first time everything seemed fairly normal. This second time the product looks different. The consistency of the detergent is thicker and it has a milky/cloudy appearance. I'm thinking it may have to do with temperature in the delivery vehicles since it's been pretty cold outside. It almost looks like they had been frozen and defrosted. We've been using them as normal and I haven't noticed any change. Just thought it was weird.
customer_reviews.author: Boodaroo_23

customer_reviews.title: NOT THE SAME!!
customer_reviews.text: I used to love this detergent, and either Amazon is selling affiliate Tide products that aren't authentic, or Tide has changed their formula. It smells terrible, more like cheap bathroom cleaner. And it irritates my skin! If I could go to a store I'd be curious to find out if the product on the shelves are different too, or if it's just Amazon. I hope this was an Amazon mix up because I love, love, love the original product!
customer_reviews.author: May

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: I really love this detergent. I bought it specifically for environmental concerns and I'm very happy I did. Cleans just as well as regular Tide (normal wear with kids, no construction workers or coal miners here!) and I LOVE the scent. Its a very light and clean fragrance without smelling like chemicals. My clothes were super soft when they came out of the dryer and I did not use any softeners, etc. Buy it, help the environment, and continue to have clean clothes.
customer_reviews.author: Eric Williams

customer_reviews.title: THEY CHANGED THE SCENT
customer_reviews.text: Edit: The scent is now completely different. It USED to be a nice, clean, natural, herbal scent, fairly similar to real lavender. Now it is like a generic, cloyingly sweet, vaguely fruity scent, that lingers on clothes. Smells like cheap hair gel. Not even the slightest resemblance to actual lavender. TIDE, you lost yourself a customer. Original: Growing up, I could swear that Tide had a particular scent. Clean. Not sweet or fruity. But these days regular Tide doesn't smell the same. This stuff, the natural lavender, seems more like old school Tide to me. It also smells more like real lavender more than any other product I have encountered.
customer_reviews.author: Pat & Deb

customer_reviews.title: Less than I expected from Amazon
customer_reviews.text: I received these bottles of Tide today thinking I got a good price only to find the bottles are missing 25% of product
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer Strohmeyer

customer_reviews.title: Do not buy, missing some product
customer_reviews.text: The two bottles were under-filled and **filled to different heights from each other**. There was a random company’s label taped around the cap as well, as if they resealed an opened bottle (Presumably after pouring some out....)
customer_reviews.author: Adam

customer_reviews.title: They changed the scent, and its not good
customer_reviews.text: used to be the only vaguely-scented laundry product i could tolerate. last order, the scent was remarkably changed to something very chemical and not at all like the old scent. very sad. caused an immediate headache.
customer_reviews.author: A. Rosson

customer_reviews.title: No!
customer_reviews.text: Rash! I have been wondering the cause of my itchy rash and removed different things from my home but I spoke to apartment mgr and she suggested laundry soap and I told her yes! I bought this brand and her daughter also had same reaction. I thought I'd try something new. Wrong move
customer_reviews.author: beth mcquillan

customer_reviews.title: Love this detergent! Will not purchase on amazon again.
customer_reviews.text: I used this detergent a couple years ago when it was on sale and liked it but bought something new when it was gone. I recently purchased the 2 pack on amazon (nov 2019) I noticed a thinner consistency,lighter color and less scent. I figured the formula had changed since I used it last. Fast forward to last week I ran out so I purchased another bottle from our local grocery store. what a difference! The color is darker and the scent is stronger, a plus in my opinion. I will not purchase from amazon again. I love and will recommend the detergent just not from amazon.
customer_reviews.author: Chelsie

customer_reviews.title: The scent is too strong
customer_reviews.text: The scent is so strong, I keep wondering, who’s perfume I’m smelling. I even tried using less. I’ve used natural laundry soap for years, maybe I’m just not used to strong scents......but I just couldn’t take it! FYI it cleaned the clothes well.
customer_reviews.author: Brandon Harstad

customer_reviews.title: Most SOFTening detergent ever!
customer_reviews.text: I'm really surprised nobody has said this. I've tried every kind of detergent, fabric softener, and additive, natural and not, that exists. I've never had my clothes and sheets feel as soft as they did after I washed using this. I'm buying for sheets and towels from now on. I didn't realize that fabrics could feel like this from adding anything. It was reaaaaaally soft. I hope my next bottle does the same, it was pretty phenomenal.
customer_reviews.author: I Buy Way Too Much STUFF!

customer_reviews.title: Not recommended
customer_reviews.text: Not a eco product weird scent rated a F on eco sites for household products
customer_reviews.author: Romans828

customer_reviews.title: Scent is suddenly very strong and now my skin breaks out in rash
customer_reviews.text: I have been purchasing this detergent for some time and started buying off Amazon because the price was very low. However, I am now noticing that the scent has changed significantly and I am breaking out with a rash. Similar to another review I just noticed, I have suspected that the bottles have been tainted and it is not the same product sold in stores. I would advise to avoid purchasing this from Amazon!
customer_reviews.author: Amy Woods

customer_reviews.title: Great quality product
customer_reviews.text: These smell really nice and leave your clothes, towels, mats, and other items CLEAN! Sometimes it can be hard to find an effective natural laundry detergent. Either the clothes doesn’t get clean enough or the clothes doesn’t smell nice. This meets both. My only con is that this brand tests on animals :( If they stopped animal testing, I would definitely purchase this product again!
customer_reviews.author: annette828

customer_reviews.title: Full it up to the top.
customer_reviews.text: I love the product itself, but I do not like the fact that my bottles are not filled to the top.. they are 1/4 down from the bottle. I have purchased this item at Target many times and I have never had this problem.l even with other Tide Products.. maybe I should just stick to buying the 150oz bottle instead..
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Very sudsy.
customer_reviews.text: I was looking for something eco-friendly and that smells great. I love this scent and I love the job tide does. I can sometimes still smell this detergent on my clothes at the end of the day. It does not irritate my skin and comes in a two pack. The only thing, which I read on other reviews before buying, is that it is extra sudsy. So be careful not the overfill as it gets bubbly. I do not mind the suds because it seems to stretch my detergent and makes the extra $$ worth it.
customer_reviews.author: Hayley Anne Hodkin

customer_reviews.title: Usually GREAT—this purchase
customer_reviews.text: I’ve been buying this stuff for a while and love it—particularly for the scent. For some reason, this batch I got smells AWFUL. Not even a hint of lavender. I don’t know what happened but it made my clothes smell bad, not even clean. I’m super disappointed because now I’ve got these bottles on the shelf and I’m out the money. I sincerely hope this doesn’t happen again.
customer_reviews.author: Nikki

customer_reviews.title: Works and smells good!
customer_reviews.text: I like the smell, it isn't lavender but still a pleasant smell. We are on a septic tank and have well water, it is hard to find detergent that smell good and works, this is it! Some others I have tried smell like swamp, or they smelt of shaving cream, not nice smells in my opinion. I gave only 4 stars, I believe there isn't anything out there that is perfect, but this is definitely close.
customer_reviews.author: Susan

customer_reviews.title: Works great, leak free shipping
customer_reviews.text: Cleans just as well as original Tide and we hope it’s better for our septic since it’s plant based. Amazon ships these securely- They come with a strong sticker over the top that holds well, but isn’t too difficult to remove. I’m very pleased with how it works, that it costs almost the same as original Tide when you use Subscribe & Save, and doesn’t leak during shipment
customer_reviews.author: Becky

customer_reviews.title: Gave me Hives!
customer_reviews.text: So here's the deal. I really liked this detergent, however, it made my entire body break out into hives daily. My life has been a living h*ll trying to figure out what was causing it because the hives didnt start until a solid month after switching detergents (mainly when my bedding was cleaned with it). I also tried extra-rinsing everything to see if maybe my Washer just wasnt getting all the soap out but that didnt help anything. So, sad to say, i wont be able to use this anymore and will be searching for another eco friendly detergent.
customer_reviews.author: Nicholas Carter

customer_reviews.title: My clothes smell soooooo nice!
customer_reviews.text: I've always loved Tide brand products over other competitor brands. Maybe I'm a bit biased bit I just find my clothes come out way "cleaner" and smell amazing. Especially when your household is mostly boys who smell like the earth, I prefer at the end of the day their garments smell fresh. The scent is so pleasing and not overwhelming.
customer_reviews.author: Marshall Spence

customer_reviews.title: Best Laundry Detergent for little ones
customer_reviews.text: Personally for us after we graduated from Dreft laundry detergent i was on the hunt for a safe clean and natural laundry detergent for our baby girl and happy we found this! We've been using this for 2 years now on our daughters clothes, blankets, bedding, stuff animals etc. and we've had no issues or breakouts whatsoever and we plan to keep using and hope they don't discontinue it! The smell is not overpowering its a mild soft smell and that's what I like about it.
customer_reviews.author: Jackie B

customer_reviews.title: anew type of Tide for me
customer_reviews.text: This is the first time I’ve used this type of tide detergent. The smell was really nice not very heavy. My clothes came out well cleaned. The size of the bottles are great the store easily on top of my washer. I like the fact that they came taped shut so nothing is spelled. I would highly recommend trying the soap.
customer_reviews.author: joy A sundstrom

customer_reviews.title: This does not have high scent
customer_reviews.text: I was hoping it would be highly scented as lavender and honey sounded nice. I barely smell anything, maybe a bit of honey, but no lavender. My clothes are barely dirty so I only purchased for the scent experience, which was low. On the other hand, I normally use Tylers High Maintenance, so likely an unfair comparison.
customer_reviews.author: Cleanlife

customer_reviews.title: So glad this product is available
customer_reviews.text: I really like the product over all but it seems to go really quickly. So pleased to have a plant based detergent from my brand. Especially for sensitive skin since I am hypersensitive and have Lupus. I would really like to know if it will be valuable the pod form any time soon?
customer_reviews.author: Katherine Nalls

customer_reviews.title: Cleaner Cloths
customer_reviews.text: My clothes come out cleaner now that I'm using Tide Purclean Plant-based formula. We are unable to use any of your other Tide products due to allergies with fragrances and certain other chemicals. My husband works in dirty soil and grease all day every day. His pants can stand up on their own with all the mud. I clean dirty, greasy cloths every week end. I get complements for his clean cloths.
customer_reviews.author: Janna Humphreys

customer_reviews.title: Excellent buy
customer_reviews.text: Though I may say the part it don't have coloring its a plus and the smell is pretty good and less harsher. washes good and for the price is great. my skin no longer breaks out with rashes this product is a plus if your worried about the coloring and sensitive skin....I do recommend this for sure
customer_reviews.author: Ms. Estrada

customer_reviews.title: Won’t ever go back!! Plant based is the way to go!
customer_reviews.text: I’m obsessed with this plant based laundry detergent. Cleans well, smells great and the price on subscribe and save is wonderful. I do like how this is much more natural and it doesn’t seem to clog up my washing machine like the old brands of non-plant detergent did.
customer_reviews.author: Sharon Heaps

customer_reviews.title: Not Much of a Smell...
customer_reviews.text: When I saw the Honey Lavender scent, I purchased it immediately. However, when the products arrived, I could not smell the scent. It is very light, and it seems to disappear. A bit disappointed because Honey Lavender if one of my favorite scents. Also, the liquid itself is watery. I remember liquid detergents to be thicker. I will not purchase again.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Changed formula, now has a gross scent
customer_reviews.text: I have used this product since it's been on shelves. I LOVED the scent. It was light and made our clothes smell wonderful. However, the formula must have been changed because it now smells disgusting. Kind of like candy? I have recommended this product to so many people. It's very disappointing.
customer_reviews.author: Joel

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: Love the scent of this detergent!! And I don't even like lavender. Not sure how to describe it, but it smells fresh and pretty to me. Just moved to a house on a septic system and wanted to switch to something bacteria-friendly. I love it. Oh yeah, gets our clothes clean, too!
customer_reviews.author: Another reviewer

customer_reviews.title: Suds up A LOT! Use very little
customer_reviews.text: It took me so long to get use to this. A little goes a loonnnggggggg way! This is not your average detergent. Whatever amount you're used to adding to your load... Use no more than 20% of that. My washer had over flowed with suds more than once. But i like this detergent
customer_reviews.author: Ct

customer_reviews.title: NOT THE SAME SMELL
customer_reviews.text: This is not the same product the smell is NOT the same
customer_reviews.author: Pasandra Thompson

customer_reviews.title: So far this is cleaning just as well and hopefully better for our wetland septic system
customer_reviews.text: we switched to this because the pod plastic was not dissolving in our front load he washing machine. So far this is cleaning just as well and hopefully better for our wetland septic system.
customer_reviews.author: Victor C. Boyd

customer_reviews.title: Cleans great, smells great!
customer_reviews.text: I have been through many natural laundry detergents and have been disappointed until now! I have 4 boys and a husband so I do lots of dirty laundry. This product works great! Gets out the stains and smells so good but not overpowering and chemically! I hope they never discontinue this!!!
customer_reviews.author: Tara wood

customer_reviews.title: Banana smell??
customer_reviews.text: Cleans great! I’m a super smeller I marked down 1 star because to me it smells like bananas. Enough fabric softener does cover it up fine. I Just don’t care for the smell when the clothes are actually washing. If you can get over the banana smell It does clean your clothes really good. Watch the measuring cup though, if you fill it full you’ll be out of soap before you know it.
customer_reviews.author: Rob

customer_reviews.title: Sensitive skin
customer_reviews.text: I’m all into “organic” when it comes to laundry stuff because I have such sensitive skin. This stuff is really nice on my clothes and the clothes don’t itch my skin so I really like these and will buy again.
customer_reviews.author: Karolinkax3

customer_reviews.title: Cleans well; smells ok; problems if use too much
customer_reviews.text: Seemed to clean well, but I must have used too much in 1 load: ended up with a bunch of small congealed pieces that I had to pick out of laundry/washer: apparently detergent, although nothing on label; smell better before washing/ok after
customer_reviews.author: H M.

customer_reviews.title: Nice
customer_reviews.text: My son and I have sensitive skin. I was worried after reading some reviews. Have used now for almost a month and no problems. Has a very subtle fresh scent. Seems to clean my dirty and greasy works clothes just fine. Very happy with this product.
customer_reviews.author: Thomas

customer_reviews.title: Great smell, cleans well
customer_reviews.text: Love this product. It smells amazing and cleans perfectly. I love that it is eco- friendly and I think it works better than most detergents. We have 3 dogs and a baby and it does the job on everything (with a little help from oxiclean). You also can use very little if you have an HE washer so it lasts a long time. Great value for the price.
customer_reviews.author: M&M

customer_reviews.title: Great for sensitive skin
customer_reviews.text: As an infant my son had sensitive skin, so I used Dreft to wash in clothes in. Now that he's a toddler, I gave this Tide a try and it seems to work great with no skin reactions. The laundry room always smell nice and fresh when I use this product which is an added bonus.
customer_reviews.author: C_Hollaway

customer_reviews.title: Bubbles that don't rinse out...
customer_reviews.text: So, it smells pretty good and decently washes, BUT I have had to re-rinse and spin multiple loads of laundry because it creates SO many boxes bubbles/soapiness that do not rinse out. I've reduced the amount I've used to see if it was just something I was doing, but that doesn't seem to be the case. I'm all about saving water so I'm not a fan of having to run an extra rinse cycle.
customer_reviews.author: Brittany Brandt

customer_reviews.title: I like Tide and the natural fragrence but they only fill ...
customer_reviews.text: I like Tide and the natural fragrence but they only fill the bottles to about 75%. Kinda shiesty on Tides part. I was not at all happy to see that they do not fill the bottle, especially with the high price they charge. I will not be getting it again.
customer_reviews.author: kerrypaul

customer_reviews.title: Amazing
customer_reviews.text: Amazing! This product leaves your clothes smelling so fresh and clean, you'll wanna wear them every day! It gets your clothes clean without using a lot of it. They packaged this item very well.
customer_reviews.author: Tamyra Greer

customer_reviews.title: The scent forced met to give it away!
customer_reviews.text: I am very sensitive to scents and was just glad that my only load with this detergent was for my husband and not my clothes. I don't usually mind a little lavender scent but this was over-powering for me.
customer_reviews.author: Jaclyn Morgan

customer_reviews.title: Not effective
customer_reviews.text: This detergent was not strong enough or effective. We cloth diaper and after only a week of using this detergent my son had ammonia burns in his diaper area. My husband also asked me if I had washed his jeans. Tide and Amazon were both wonderful at helping us to resolve the issue and receive a full refund however I wouldn't recommend this particular product.
customer_reviews.author: LM

customer_reviews.title: Worth a try
customer_reviews.text: Worked decently well for a plant-based detergent, though I've used better. It didn't remove remove the stains from my work clothes very well. Nice smell though!
customer_reviews.author: Rachael

customer_reviews.title: 20% of the volume is missing
customer_reviews.text: I bought 4 of these and all of them arrived with 20% of the liquid detergent missing. It's as if the seller is emptying out some of it to make more money. It is notably lower in volume than the same product in a grocery store. I will not be buying this again.
customer_reviews.author: JJ

customer_reviews.title: Inconsistent but smells nice.
customer_reviews.text: I love this detergent because of it's mild yet pleasant scent. When they discontinued it from my local store I went online to purchase it. This is the second time I've ordered it and both times I've had an issue with misleading ouce quantity. You can see in the picture with the seal still on they are different levels.
customer_reviews.author: Michael Kuhn

customer_reviews.title: Not worth it
customer_reviews.text: Way too expensive for what you get. Much better naturals out there. Too watery and not the greatest clean. Going back to Arm and Hammer sensitive or even Purell. Was very disappointed when it arrived, and I couldn’t wait for it to get here, originally.
customer_reviews.author: RKM

customer_reviews.title: Missing tape on caps
customer_reviews.text: Returned from a week long business trip and bought it wait the fabric softener. None of them had the tape on the cap to keep it from opening. It was everywhere. My husband was being helpful and threw all of it out since it was mixed. I do not have the bottles to return. This was highly disappointing and I won’t be buying from here again.
customer_reviews.author: KIMBERLY SIlVERS

customer_reviews.title: Favorite detergent
customer_reviews.text: Gets my clothes clean with a soft scent that is not too overpowering. Natural plant based detergent so it isn't as harmful for the environment. I would recommend this to anyone wanting a good laundry detergent.
customer_reviews.author: Kaberg72

customer_reviews.title: Not the real thing
customer_reviews.text: I have used this Tide Purclean detergent for years and love it. It is a great laundry detergent for sensitive skin and still smells good! The product I received is either defective or not the real thing. It irritated my skin, and instead of the normal light floral scent, this product smells like artificial watermelon. I am very disappointed in Amazon. I have since bought this detergent from other sources and have not had these issues.
customer_reviews.author: eao

customer_reviews.title: Great smelling detergent - two smaller bottles.
customer_reviews.text: Bottles are smaller than I expected, but that is just my fault for not checking their size. Love the smell of this detergent.
customer_reviews.author: Rachel K

customer_reviews.title: Smells so good
customer_reviews.text: I like the fact that it is a healthier alternative to a lot of other detergents, I wish it was a little cheaper price for the size, but it works well and smells so good so it’s worth it to me
customer_reviews.author: JD

customer_reviews.title: Yuck
customer_reviews.text: What happened? Loved the scent and now my February bottles smell different, like chemical. Gross. I’m done
customer_reviews.author: lonnasmom

customer_reviews.title: Smells amazing and ok for sensitive skin
customer_reviews.text: I’m so happy I discovered this- it will be my go to detergent from now on. My family has sensitive skin and I’ve sacrificed amazing smelling laundry for the non-scented options that wouldn’t irritate their skin. This smells wonderful without being overpowering perfume-like and hasn’t caused any irritation. Yay!
customer_reviews.author: Mandy

customer_reviews.title: So impressed buying again
customer_reviews.text: So impressed and you enjoy this bottle I enjoy the way my laundry smells and I enjoy the product itself. Most of my family has sensitive skin we all had no issues with this product
customer_reviews.author: N. White

customer_reviews.title: Mildly nauseating fragrance
customer_reviews.text: After using this detergent several times, I'm forced to conclude the team who designed the fragrance has never encountered either a flower or a bee in their lives. I bought two large containers, but I'm going to have to toss them; the smell just doesn't agree with me at all.
customer_reviews.author: jsgraydon

customer_reviews.title: It smells so good and leaves cloths feeling good
customer_reviews.text: This smells so good and so fresh. I love The way my cloths feel (I do also use fabric softener) but this product doesn’t leave that feeling like the cloths weren’t rinsed enough it leaves them perfect. Haven’t used it on any stains yet, but overall in love with this soap and will get this from now on!
customer_reviews.author: Barbara Schmidt

customer_reviews.title: Great scent and value
customer_reviews.text: Great value, way cheaper than the stores. Love the scent and that it’s all natural, keeps my clothes smelling great even after a wear.
customer_reviews.author: Ashley Salazar

customer_reviews.title: Pass on this.
customer_reviews.text: I didn’t like that the product separated. Weird. Did not repurchase.
customer_reviews.author: Threadheadrva

customer_reviews.title: Great detergent
customer_reviews.text: First time trying this soap trying to think better for environment , just be carful to only use very little it’s very concentrated
customer_reviews.author: roxie

customer_reviews.title: Great for sensitive skin 👌
customer_reviews.text: I liked this laundry detergent I have sensitive skin and tried other detergents in the past that made me itchy but this one didn't and so far I'm happy with
customer_reviews.author: Joshua

customer_reviews.title: Spendy
customer_reviews.text: Doesn't seem to be the same formula I have gotten before, scent is different but it does clean my laundry so can't complain too much.
customer_reviews.author: Jessica

customer_reviews.title: Buy your detergent at your local store
customer_reviews.text: I believe this soap was fake and it ruined my front loader with all the suds. I had to have a technician repair my machine. I'm skeptical of its authenticity.
customer_reviews.author: ruby

customer_reviews.title: Unique smell
customer_reviews.text: The smell is different than any laundry detergent I have ever bought. I will get it again for it’s unique smell.
customer_reviews.author: Lily of the Valley

customer_reviews.title: Great
customer_reviews.text: This is a great laundry detergent. Although it smells great, it is a strong scent. It is very affordable though.
customer_reviews.author: B

customer_reviews.title: Probably the best smelling detergent that we used
customer_reviews.text: Probably the best smelling detergent that we used! Won't switch back to the cheap stuff after this. Doesn't smell obnoxious, but the scent is glorious non-the-less. Makes clothes smell fresh out of the dryer without using dryer sheets. Highly recommended!!
customer_reviews.author: Eric

customer_reviews.title: Is this 50fl oz’s?
customer_reviews.text: I haven’t opened it yet as you can see & these containers seem unfairly not full enough. Is this how they all are?
customer_reviews.author: Marcia K. O'brien

customer_reviews.title: Good but thin
customer_reviews.text: I love the smell and results of using this detergent, however it’s thinner than I thought it would be.
customer_reviews.author: Janiesha

customer_reviews.title: Smells wonderful
customer_reviews.text: Love this detergent! Smells so good and doesn’t irritate my roommates skin after I use the washer.
customer_reviews.author: Alisia

customer_reviews.title: Great smell, great clean
customer_reviews.text: This detergent is great for anyone looking for something that is non irritating on skin but still gives a thorough clean. It also smells great and you don't have to use a lot per load.
customer_reviews.author: Cassidy S.

customer_reviews.title: Quantity and quality
customer_reviews.text: I use this soap to wash my dogs clothes, blankets, toys, etc. He started loosing hair with other soaps I used before this one and thought I’d give it a try and his coat is way better, of course with the help of his food and other stuff as well,I give this soap 5 stars, if you’re looking for something like your pets clothes!
customer_reviews.author: Alondra Jazmin Duron

customer_reviews.title: Love it
customer_reviews.text: My favorite detergent and works great for not only my husband's sensitive skin but also my kiddos. As well as cloth diapers

customer_reviews.title: Lovely scent
customer_reviews.text: We wanted to switch to a more natural detergent but all the others smelled like paint to me (barfs). This one has a nice scent and I can wash my whole family’s clothes with one detergent

customer_reviews.title: Would buy again and again.
customer_reviews.text: I have very sensitive skin and this is wonderful on problems. I love the product.

customer_reviews.title: I'm not satisfied with how the item was send.
customer_reviews.text: This item was not seal properly. And it leak out. I'm thinking twice if I'm going to buy it again.

customer_reviews.title: Environmentally friendly & Foes s good clean job.
customer_reviews.text: This product does a nice job of cleaning the clothes and I’m happy that it’s environmentally friendly

customer_reviews.title: Plant based
customer_reviews.text: Good price. I like that it is plant based. Two kids two adults and the two pack lasted over 2 months of laundry loads. Pretty good.
customer_reviews.author: G REAL REVIEWS

customer_reviews.title: Love it - my fave washing detergent
customer_reviews.text: We love this detergent. It is plant-based, smells great and is clear so it doesn't stain your clothes "blue" if you pour it straight on by accident. And is reasonably priced - Thanks Tide!

product_meta.title: Tide Purclean Plant-Based Laundry Detergent Liquid, Honey Lavender Scent, Pack of 2, 64 Loads Total (Packaging May Vary)
product_meta.description: Tide purclean with honey lavender scent is the first bio-based liquid laundry detergent that has the cleaning power that you expect and deserve from Tide. Tide has been on a journey of sustainability for many years now and this is the latest step in this journey to deliver a more sustainable product that does not compromise on cleaning performance. It is the first 65% USDA certified bio-based detergent with the cleaning power of Tide. Tide purclean is a formula made with 100% renewable wind power electricity (1) and is made at a site that has zero manufacturing waste to landfill. It is also formulated to be free of dyes, chlorine and phosphates. The formula contains water, plant derived surfactants, coconut derived cleaning agent, plant derived processing aid, bio-derived enzymes, mineral based enzyme stabilizer, pH adjuster, chelant and fragrance. For a full list of ingredients visit our site. (1) The same facility also uses steam power; electricity represents approximately 50% of total energy used.
feature_bullets: 1st bio-based detergent with the cleaning power of Tide (65% bio-based)
USDA Certified Tide liquid laundry detergent

Formula made with 100% renewable wind power electricity at a zero manufacturing waste to landfill site (the same facility also uses steam power; electricity represents approximately 50% of total energy used)
It is designed free of dyes, chlorine, phosphates or optical brighteners; Test inside seam for colorfastness.

For both High Efficiency (HE) and regular washers. Instructions: Measure with cap. For Medium Loads, fill to bar 1. For Large Loads, fill to bar 3. For he Full Loads, fill to bar 5. Add detergent, then add clothes
